thread.title: Supergirl Season 2 Episode 10: We Can Be Heroes Sneak Preview
thread.title_full: Supergirl Season 2 Episode 10: We Can Be Heroes Sneak Preview

author: Jay Jayson
title: Supergirl Season 2 Episode 10: We Can Be Heroes Sneak Preview
text:
Supergirl Season 2 Episode 10: We Can Be Heroes Sneak Preview Jay Jayson Tweet This 
After Kevin Smith delivered an exciting midseason premiere, The CW released a sneak preview of next Monday's episode of Supergirl —which is titled “We Can Be Heroes” and features the return of the villainous Livewire /Leslie Willis (portrayed by Brit Morgan). 
Check out a sneak preview in the video above and read its official synpsis directly below. 
After Livewire (guest star Brit Morgan) seemingly breaks out of prison, Supergirl (Melissa Benoist) is intent on recapturing her. After training Mon-El (Chris Wood), Supergirl takes him with her when she sees Livewire attack the NCPD but things go awry when Mon-El puts Supergirl before the citizens of National City. Meanwhile, James (Mehcad Brooks) decides to come clean with Kara and M’Gann (guest star Sharon Leal), has a psychic attack and collapses into a coma. 
Rebecca Johnson directed the episode written by Caitlin Parrish & Katie Rose Rogers. 
“We Can Be Heroes” episode of Supergirl will air Monday, January 30 at 8 p.m. ET/PT on The CW.
